title: Harvard's Frei on How Leaders Can Empower
itunes:title: Harvard's Frei on How Leaders Can Empower
description:
Frances Frei, Professor at Harvard Business School, discusses her book "Unleashed: The Unapologetic Leader’s Guide to Empowering Everyone Around You." She points out the need for leaders to focus on the well being of others.

Hosts: Carol Massar and guest co-host Alix Steel. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
